title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts False Alarm: Air Defense Success in Nahariya but Soldier Injured”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target in the maritime area of Nahariya that crossed from Lebanese territory. No alerts were activated according to policy.

Following alerts regarding concerns about the infiltration of hostile aircraft in the northern part of the country, interceptors were launched from the Safed area toward a suspicious aerial target, which turned out to be a false alarm. As a result of debris from the interceptors launched in the Safed area, a reservist soldier was moderately injured and evacuated for medical treatment at a hospital. His family has been notified.
